'''Aru''', also known as '''Argos''', is an [[NPC]] located in [[Enkanomiya]], [[Inazuma]].

==Profile==
Aru is a sinless Sinshade specifically created to facilitate [[Watatsumi Mitama Omatsuri|rituals]]. He is specifically in charge of explaining how to restore the [[Reins of Revival]]<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent}}</ref> needed to access the depths of Enkanomiya where the Jade Coral Branch can be found.
